description: It's not as fully-featured as iCue, but it seems to run a lot more lighter and works well enough.
It does exactly what is advertised, and is fast and simple.
summary: Great RGB driver for Corsair devices

description: Just what I needed to enable some RGB effects on my K65 as well as some keybinding changes that I needed. Thank you for the effort you've put into this! Interface is slightly clunky, but I am not complaining.
summary: Works great on my K65 RGB

description: I've tried both the git and the store versions of this in multiple configurations with all sorts of troubleshooting but apparently ckb-next still thinks the corsair keyboard I'm typing this review on doesn't exist
it tells me I have no Corsair products, but I know better....I know the truth

Haven't explored the program, so don't know how it compares to Corsair's iCue in terms of features and customization. But allowed me to quickly and easily change my keyboard's LED lighting. FYI: runs in background to maintain control. No noticeable performance penalty thus far.
summary: Worked great within seconds of install

description: I too have a corsair product. But it lies.
summary: It too told me a lie!

description: Makes things fancy.
it works out of the box, I opened the program and I can direct start changing the rgb! (Corsair K55)
Better then the windows version in simplicity, it fits ubuntus pretty basic theme, not trying to be showy like Corsairs
summary: Works fine on Ubuntu 20.04- Easier then the windows OEM

description: Tried restarting and plugging in again. Doesn't recognize that I have 2 corsair items attached.
My keyboard started to warm up! k70 mk2

Downloaded instantly. Installed instantly. Starts up INSTANTLY having already recognized my K95 keyboard automatically and lit it up. Already this experience is WAY better than the "official" alternative. Functionality is pretty limited (not so many effects to choose from), and it doesn't work with my mouse yet, but so far this is PHENOMENAL.
summary: WAY more responsive than the OEM software for Windows and Mac

description: this software is better then windows ver. and i'm a linux noob!
This is much better than the official windows software. It works!
Harpoon rgb mouse was unusable with default linux sensitivity curve. Thank god for this app, rgb + performance works perfectly.

Event better than iCUE.
Many thanks
mouse stops working for a few seconds after installing it and my keyboard dosnt show up
Insanely good reccomended to everyone with a corsair keyboard
Sad.
Immidiately detected my K68 RGB and provided me with the functionality that Corsair ICUE software does without the bloat. I loved it!
nice app I recommend
summary: app is well running with my corsair keyboard k70

description: No dect my Mouse
a lot customisation options

Works fine and has most of the features for customisation that the windows app does, exception being the record macro key.

Would be nice if it could detect my M65 so I could customise that too.
Since Version 5.x the K60 Pro worked fine now!
summary: K60 Pro - worked fine on Kubuntu 22.04

description: I think they're working on it. Got my fingers crossed.
summary: Works great with my K55. :-) Doesn't work with my K100. :-(

description: My K70 hand-me-down from my son is looking great. No problems whatsoever. Way better than the stock keyboard settings.
Nice utility but did not work with Corsair K55 Pro and did not offer alot of options in the window I saw.
summary: Did not work with K55 Pro

description: If you're expecting iCue, you've got the wrong idea. Does not support Corsair headphones but gives me the control I want with my mouse and keyboard.
summary: Works well with K55 / Glaive combo

description: I was so happy to see my straife RGB light up in rainbow for the first time since I first switched to linux. Thanks for reminding me how good the lighting looked on it.

I have a corsair keyboard and mouse (M65 pro rgb and k65 lux rgb) and both work perfectly with this app. Both were detected automatically after install and all of the functions of both the mouse and keyboard are able to be tuned in app. The app also supports firmware update. Thanks for the awesome work.
Excellent app with no fuss managing my strafe RGB perfectly.
Easier to figure out than the windows official app. I got my number keys mapped like I want them. Thank you!
summary: My Scimitar Mouse number keys are working again!

description: I haven't explored the advanced features yet but the basic settings it supports well.

Saner defaults than Corsair's own icue. Mouse follows the background lighting intensity of the keyboard (k70 and m65pro) when adjusting it from the keyboard. Uses nearly 0 resources compared to icue. Well done!
I have been using this for the past several years to support my Corsair Glaive. It's so nice to have simple, direct mouse driver software, as opposed to the Corsair Windows software.
Works Perfectly with my Corsair Strafe RGB keyboard!
summary: Works Perfectly with my Corsair Strafe

description: Dark Core RGB findet danach den Funkkontakt. Geil
Hallo, mir ist aufgefallen das die App immer immer Vordergrund gestartet wird und nicht im Hintergund.
Gestaltet das Management meiner Geräte auf Linux genauso simpel wie man es mit der iCue App gewohnt ist. Genial.

Klappt super mit dem K95!
Vielen Dank!
Genial¡ puedo tener tanto mi (Teclado + Mouse) con iluminación. Muchas gracias.
Tengo teclado y mouse Corsair y puedo configurar los tipos de iluminacion de manera perfecta!
No reconoce la diadema, si alguien sabe como configurarlo escribame por favor juannco@gmail.com

Excellent pour les périphériques Corsair (si les votres sont dans la liste de compatibilité, évidemment). RGB, Marco, sauvegardes de profils, tout y est c'est parfait Corsair devrait en prendre de la graine et rendre leurs drivers open source !
Жаль , что так и не добавили М90 мышку
